backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Nebacrypt backend, defining project submission management, user profiles, access control, and blob storage with Norwegian-language authorization checks and admin email notifications.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two footer-related changes: removing the standalone 'Nebadon Encryption AS' company name text and stripping 'Nebadon Encryption' from the copyright line in Footer.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, briefly describing the purpose and recent changes of each component, page, hook, and configuration file.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Nebacrypt React app with Norwegian language, SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata, and a vector favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page routing (including the 'icp-info' route), authentication state, profile setup modal display, and loading screen logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying the Nebacrypt logo, a copyright/caffeine.ai attribution bar without a company name, and contact details (org number and Oslo address).
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation header with desktop and mobile menus, Internet Identity login/logout, admin dashboard link, and an 'Internet Computer' nav item.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay showing the Nebacrypt logo with a pulse animation, a spinning ring, and the Norwegian text 'Laster inn...'.
frontend/src/components/MusicTrackCard.t: Renders a clickable card linking to a Suno music track, with a helper function that parses a human-readable title from various Suno URL formats.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects name, email, and optional company from a new user and creates their profile via the useCreateUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: A public-facing project submission form that collects client details and budget, submits the project via useSubmitProject, and shows a success screen or login option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and expose identity state to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including user profile CRUD, project submission, and message queries, with cache invalidation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens and a few utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all project submissions in a table, allows status management (reviewed, followup, in-progress, completed), messaging, and delivery link attachment. Includes admin-only access guard using `useIsCallerAdmin`.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortal.tsx: Client-facing portal where authenticated users (via Internet Identity) can submit projects, view their project statuses with badges, and exchange messages with admins. Also exposes a public submission form for unauthenticated visitors.
frontend/src/pages/ICPInfoPage.tsx: Informational page (in Norwegian) explaining Internet Computer Protocol technology, covering key pillars like canisters, subnets, chain-key cryptography, NNS governance, and use cases such as DeFi, NFTs, and social media.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page featuring a hero section with logo, a teaser for ICP technology, and smooth-scroll navigation to services and contact sections. Provides entry points to the client portal and music page.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music showcase page listing tracks by 'Synthetic Agondonters' with links to Suno, a hero image, and a descriptive blurb about the artist concept. Includes a link to the Suno artist profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, typography/container-query/animate plugins, and accordion keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking two completed features that remove the 'Nebadon Encryption AS' company name from the Footer component's standalone label and copyright line.
